summary: The diff implements both requested frontend behaviors: (1) accepted-state now always shows a happiest puppy GIF, and (2) the sad puppy sequence loops on repeated NO clicks via modulo cycling. No clear missing requirements are evident from the provided diff summary, though some acceptance-criteria text/animation invariants cannot be fully verified due to truncation.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added project metadata summaries (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json) beyond the requested UI behavior changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for two UI behavior adjustments (REQ-12/REQ-13) and explicitly requested minimizing unrelated changes; these metadata summary updates are not requested requirements.
